message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be incredibly valuable.  I understand you may not be familiar with its specifics, so I'm happy to provide you with more information.  While I believe this product is worth significantly more than $1000000, I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1500000. This gives you a substantial opportunity for potential gains. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
